import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Filters=()=>{const[filters]=useState(["Type of Plants","Price","Nursery","Ideal Plants Location","Indoor/ Outdoor","Maintenance","Plant Size","Water Schedule","Color","Seasonal","Light Efficient"]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filters-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filters-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Filter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"clear-all",children:"CLEAR ALL"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"filters-list",children:filters.map((filter,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"filter-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:filter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"toggle",children:"+"})]},index))})]});};export default Filters;
